alert.note: Alert for Clay (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 28 at 5:33AM EDT until July 29 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... South Fork Kentucky River at Oneida affecting Clay County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...South Fork Kentucky River at Oneida. * WHEN...From early this morning to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Water is over the road at the bridge and enters the back shop near the track. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 23.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall to 16.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Action stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. The next statement will be issued by 10 AM this morning.
